resources.string: Fall Detection needs your location to work fully
Fall Detection needs permission to send SMS texts to work fully
Request Location, SMS Sending, and Call Log
Fall Detection needs permission to send SMS texts and your location to work fully
Fall Detection needs permission to access contacts to work fully
Please enter in two phone numbers of people you would want to have contacted in case you fall. The symbols \"(\", \")\", and \"-\" are not needed.

Thank you for choosing Fall Detection! The app will use the two numbers you provided as emergency contacts. It will also add contacts who you communicate often with through phone calls or text messages to ensure your safety.
